com.travelsupermarket.referencedata.elasticsearch.querybuilder

Class HolidaysAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelsupermarket.referencedata.elasticsearch.querybuilder.HolidaysAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElasticsearchQueryBuilder

    public class HolidaysAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ElasticsearchQueryBuilder
    Builds queries and search requests for holidays auto complete queries for Elasticsearch.
